title: Is it possible to see statistics for all my games in previous months?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I would like to customize what statistics I see in my reports.

sections.title: Cause
content: You are currently not able to see the desired statistics and would like to be able to do so.

sections.title: Resolution
content: You can generate a report for your entire organization by going to the Statistics tab on the main Ads dashboard.
From here, you can set the date range and split the data as needed for a report containing all of your games.
You can also use the monetization stats API to fetch customized statistics from your game.
